review.rating: Perfect place for a long stay
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i CÃ³ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: Amazing apartment, brand-new, clean and spacious! Perfect for long stay because itâ€™s just 10 min away from the old city so itâ€™s easy to get a grab there but itâ€™s not that chaotic and noisy. The building is in a quite alley and therefore itâ€™s perfect for a good sleep. There are plenty of restaurants and coffee shops around and one big supermarket in 3 min walk. Hot water and good pressure in shower are just a cherry on top. Overall, we had a great experience there, the manager and cleaning lady both were very nice and attentive, so highly recommend.

review.rating: I stayed here for a month and everything was great - would 100% recommend especially for
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i CÃ³ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: Wonderful apartment in every way. There was everything one could need for a great stay, short or long. Really clean, modern, everything worked and was comfortable. The housekeeper was lovely and I had no concerns about the safety of the apartment. The location may not be ideal for those visiting Hanoi for only a couple of days, but in any other case great central location with cafes and kiosks next door.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to complain!

review.rating: There's No Place Like Galaxy Home ...
review.room_type: Suite Junior CoÌ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: Staff bent over backwards to help me with some odd-shaped requests, the page is new and spotlessly clean. Very comfortable stay in private luxury accommodation.
review.comment_negative: A word for the LTRs in 701! Packing a bag and making food between 10:30pm and 12am doesn't constitute a 'noise nuisance' and a full shoe rack outside the door isn't a status symbol! You should hear yourself singing in the bath! The plughole makes a sweeter sound!!!

review.rating: Xuáº¥t sáº¯c
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i CÃ³ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: Just 10/10, quiet area and good, fresh building with soundproof walls, new interior and it's really clean. Here's a big winmart and pizza on the woods nearby also. Staff amazing too

review.rating: Perfect place for quiet sleep ğŸ˜´
review.room_type: Suite Junior CoÌ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: This hotels apartment changed our stay in Hanoi completely. Every single place that we've been to before this one was loud and not perfectly cleaned. At Galaxy Home Doi Can our sleep was just great. Blackout Curtains makes the room very dark and the only noise that we could hear was a rooster, but ear plugs helped with that. No street noises or construction around this hotel during our stay in February 2024.  Room is very well designed and modern. Comes with smart tv, fridge, microwave, heating and ac also available. Having a washing machine in the room is always a bonus while travelling. Everything was perfectly cleaned and communication was friendly and professional. Easy to say if we are ever in Hanoi again we are not going to look for another hotel.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: It was a pleasant stay!
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i CÃ³ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: New, modern, quite apartment (the one in 7th floor)

review.rating: A clean, spacious, convenient and noise-free apartment!
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i CÃ³ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive:
We thoroughly enjoy our stay here! The communication with Chá»‹ Anh is very smooth. She is always very responsive and even very patient with my basic/poor Vietnamese (that being said, she communicates very well in English). The guard/cleaning lady is also very kind and helpful! We really feel at home. 

In terms of facilities, you basically get everything prepared even some essential kitchen utensils. However, since the location of this apartment is really good and close to many local restaurants, we did not use the kitchen. It is located at the end of a small 'ngÃµ'/alley. Even though it is only around 30 meters away from the main road, you can't hear any noise. Loads of cafes and restaurants are nearby. We actually walked to the old town quite often -- it is about 25-30 mins walk -- with quite a lots of traffic along the way, which is quite normal in Hanoi given the number of its motorbike. Otherwise, the old town is very accessible through Grab from the apartment. Usually it just takes about 10-15 mins by car. The view from the balcony is also amazing. Overall, we will definitely come back here whenever we travel to Hanoi!

Cáº£m Æ¡n chá»‹ vÃ¬ sá»± thÃ¢n thiá»‡n vÃ  sá»± tá»‘t bá»¥ng !
review.comment_negative: The only one small thing I would say is that when taking the shower, the hot water can sometimes be a little bit 'unstable'. But in any case, this should not deter you from booking this nice apartment!
